description:
Hello Ballerina Enthusiasts!

I am thrilled to welcome each and every one of you to our brand new Ballerina Language Forum! Whether you're a seasoned developer or just starting to explore the world of Ballerina, this forum is the perfect place for you to connect, share knowledge, and grow together as a community.
comment: This forum is not just about Ballerina; it's about the people who make up the Ballerina community. Let's foster a collaborative and friendly environment where we can all learn, share, and grow together.
title: Welcome to the Ballerina Language Forum!

description: In this post, I'll walk you through the basics of functions in Ballerina. From defining parameters to return types, let's dive into the world of function declarations and invocations.
comment: Can we modify the function parameter value within the function?
title: Introduction to Ballerina Functions

description: In this post, I'll walk you through the basics of functions in Ballerina. From defining parameters to return types, let's dive into the world of function declarations and invocations.
comment: Functions are declared using the `function` keyword. It accepts zero or more arguments and returns a single value. The `returns` keyword is used to indicate the return type of the function.
title: Introduction to Ballerina Functions
